requirements.documentation: FPP parameters used to set design objectives and constraints

requirements.flattop_duration.documentation: Duration of the flattop (use Inf for steady-state)

requirements.h98y2.documentation: H98y2 ITER elmy H-mode confinement scaling factor

requirements.hds03.documentation: Petty 2003 H-mode thermal energy confinement scaling factor

requirements.lh_power_threshold_fraction.documentation: Fraction of the LH power threshold

requirements.ne_peaking.documentation: On-axis electron density / volume-averaged electron denstiy

requirements.power_electric_net.documentation: Net electric power generated by the fusion power plant

requirements.q_pol_omp.documentation: Poloidal heat flux at the outer midplane

requirements.tritium_breeding_ratio.documentation: Tritium breeding ratio of the whole plant
